title: Charming 3 Bed 2 Bath Townhome for Rent Cherry Creek School District!
map_address: S Picadilly Ct near S Riviera Way
posting_body: Charming 3 bed, 2 bath townhome located in a wonderful neighborhood within the Cherry Creek School District!
The main floor has a bright open floor plan perfect for entertaining.
The second floor boasts the spacious primary bedroom, with two walk-in closets, and en suite bathroom, as well as two additional bedrooms and full bath.
Enjoy the patio in the backyard and low maintenance landscaping.
Close proximity to shopping, restaurants, several parks, walking trails, Antelope Ridge Elementary, Thunder Ridge Middle School, and Eagle Crest High School!
Pets considered with additional pet deposit and pet rent
Other utilities will be tenant's responsibility
*Must apply directly on our website - We don't accept outside applications*
